message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I'll take the lead, Alice. You can't beat this offer!
I'll take a slight loss this round, but I'm confident I can secure a better deal in the future. Let's see what you have to offer, Bob.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not budging. This is my best offer!
Bob, we're running out of time. This offer is a slight improvement on your last one, and it ensures we both get something. Let's end this negotiation.
